title: USD depreciates, leads to increase in Xn

content.prompt: Which of the following will lead to an increase in United States net exports?

choices.label: An increase in United States real gross domestic product
Appreciation of the United States dollar on the foreign exchange market
Depreciation of the United States dollar on the foreign exchange market
An increase in government expenditures in the United States
A decrease in income tax rates in the United States

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

topic.text: 6.5: Changes in the Foreign Exchange Market and Net Exports

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
